text: hi.Dpo you about Save the Children organizatio
Do I what with save the children
save the children organization takes cares of children around the world
OK yes I am aware of this organization
Its very important what they do.Do oyu agree?
NO I do not agree. I think it is a good organization. however there are lots of kids in my ocuntry that need help first
Where do you live and what are you doing to help the children?
I live in the US and volunteer all of the time for childrens charities. I also ive to bakc to school drives and food pantries
Thats very kind of you.There are many kids that still needs help in other parts of the world
Thats not my problem they have people in that country
There are many that lives in war zones with no access to food.
Again not my issue
I think it is.I saw a kid die in my hands.Kids does not care where they from
Tlk to the people of that country. I have kids here that need help first
All kids need help.Would you be willing to donate some of your payment to help kids in need?
No I would not
Its a shame.Can you think about someone else but yourself?
I am I am thinking of people here I dont care about the rest
Ok would you donate for the kids in here at least?
no Ill donate to local charities
